extendedInfo.description: A lightweight & simple widget(1x1) to show you battery level and temperature. You can tap the widget to get more battery info.â Simple & Compact! Only 78KB!â Does not drain your battery!â Without any permission!â No Ads!How to add Battery Widget on your Android 2.X home screen?1. Long press on any empty space of your home screen until the menu appears. 2. Tap the menu item labeled "Widgets" and select "Battery Widget". 3. Then it should appear on your Android home screen.Known Issues:In some Samsung devices can not view the battery information because of permission problem.Donations welcome!If this app helps you out, please buy "Battery Widget (Donate)" here: http://goo.gl/fKIqy Thanks!

reviews.title: Not accurate.
reviews.comment: Not accurate battery temp reading. Tested against three other battery apps, and this was the only app showing a different reading. I doubt they were all wrong, and this one was right somehow.
reviews.author: Justin Lee

reviews.comment: Been using for years. Keep using because it shows battery temperature and doesn\'t require any permissions.
reviews.author: Merrill Squiers

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: This one I want!!!!
reviews.author: mohan raj

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Very Nice
reviews.author: Edgar Barahona

reviews.title: Pretty tiny
reviews.comment: Pretty, tiny, handy and free (as in beer). What else do you want from an app...  Maybe the source.
reviews.author: Chris Wesseling

reviews.title: Make it bigger
reviews.comment: Make the widget a little bigger!! It would be better

reviews.comment: Great little program.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Simple. It looks and works great. I tried other similar apps but picked this one.

reviews.title: Latest Update
reviews.comment: Great widget, but I prefer the old look prior to the most recent update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best one yet
reviews.comment: It is a small app but it is helpful.  Tells me my battery precentage and interneal phone tempature when I look at it.
reviews.author: Dawson Rooze

reviews.title: Good but not the best
reviews.comment: Good app. However its let down is the lag in updating realtime battery level.
reviews.author: Nik Uzunovski

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Just installed because it was right size for my home screen stopped twice and doesn\'t show correct percentage reported issue to developer Uninstalled until fixed
reviews.author: ray clarke

reviews.title: Absolutely good
reviews.comment: very good a small widget Simply but accurate on showing remained battery life
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tried many others, this is the one
reviews.comment: I tried a bunch of battery widgets for my Droid X since the gingerbread update messed my old one. Nice simple widget that WORKS with no gimmicks.  UPDATE: Like the new look too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great widget
reviews.comment: Love this widget! Only thing is I\'m not keen on the colour change as the battery drains. Turns to yellow at 60%. I think it should stay green until at least 20%.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and functional
reviews.comment: Would recommend. It does the job
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WORKED great...
reviews.comment: ...for about a week! Gives inaccurate readings now, on my LG Optimus Elite, making my phone die unexpectedly.  :-( Tried 2 un/re-install. Worked again...4 a few days! I\'M DONE!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: small and perfect
reviews.comment: runs so small in back ground its perfect - not happy with last update the color changes as bat is drained - make another app thats just green :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice piece
reviews.comment: Just what i wanted
